title: Bill Announcement – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			
Issued on:
December 17, 2020
On Thursday, December 17, 2020, the President signed into law:H.R. 473, which authorizes the Every Word We Utter Monument to establish a commemorative work in the District of Columbia to commemorate the women’s suffrage movement and passage of the 19th Amendment to the Constitution.
